H0.text: What name is given to a line on a map joining places of equal rainfall. Ombroline

H1.text: What name is given to a line on a map joining places of equal rainfall. Pluviogram

H2.text: What name is given to a line on a map joining places of equal rainfall. Hyetograph

H3.text: What name is given to a line on a map joining places of equal rainfall. Isohel

A4.text: An isohyet or isohyetal line (from Ancient Greek  ὑετός (huetos) 'rain') is a line on a map joining points of equal rainfall in a given period.

A5.text: A hyetograph is a graphical representation of the distribution of rainfall intensity over time.

A6.text: The maximum intensity may not be reached as uniformly as shown in the SCS hyetographs.
